We use the values of freedom, sustainability and equality as the foundation on which we examine issues in politics, economy and employment & labour. We are committed to publishing cutting-edge thinking and new ideas from the most thought-provoking people.

The 21st century may be the Pacific Century, and China appears poised to become America’s greatest rival for global power and influence. Hosts John Yoo and Michael Auslin broadly address developments in China and Asia. They discuss the latest politics, economics, law, and cultural news, with a focus on US policy in the region.

Montana Lowdown features in-depth conversations with top newsmakers, journalists, politicians, and experts about significant issues facing America's "last best place." 

Veteran award-winning journalist John S. Adams, founder and editor of  Montana Free Press and the star of the documentary film "Dark Money," hosts the podcast, shedding light on essential news stories and broadening the debate on the hottest topics.
Guillermo José Torres y Maricarmen Ortíz traen la información de cara a las elecciones junto el análisis de el profesor Ángel Rosa y Leo Aldridge.
Political insiders James Carville and Al Hunt offer a backstage pass to impeachment and the 2020 Election.

podcast_details.podcast_name: KGW’s Straight Talk with Laural Porter
podcast_details.description: Straight Talk with Laural Porter

The Plan-Cast is a volunteer organized podcast developed by a group of Warren for President 2020 supporters. This pod is not affiliated or paid for by the Warren for President 2020 Campaign. The Plan-Cast is meant to be a resource for all Warren 2020 supporters and undecided voters in the 2020 Democratic Primaries. Join us and an expert in their respected field every week as we breakdown one of Elizabeth Warren’s awesome plans!
podcast_details.artist_name: Kristin Bustos, Rosalia Cefalu & Lauren Vega

podcast_details.description: Behind the Walls is an insider view beyond the razor wire and red tape of the Texas criminal justice system. Chronicle reporter and ex-con Keri Blakinger and former Texas prisons union president Lance Lowry explore jails, prisons, and the darkest places in criminal justice.
Comentarios y análisis de temas de actualidad en la política de EEUU, en la Geopolitica y un poco de otras cosas. Todo en "arroz y habichuelas", sin pretensiones de intelectualidad.
Una selección de artículos y reportajes de El País narrados y ambientados para que tengas una experiencia distinta del consumo habitual del texto y puedas escucharlos desde donde prefieras

This is an adjunct to my long-running blog at Bookworm Room. There, I talk about politics and social issues from a conservative perspective. My blog's motto is "conservatives deal with facts and reach conclusions; liberals have conclusions and sell them as facts."

When it comes to politics, Dan Kingston is located at the intersection of fact and reason. 

Kingston's ideology defying political commentary is fast paced and cuts deep. 

• Defend the Founding Fathers 
• End the endless wars
• Confront the 22 trillion dollar debt

podcast_details.podcast_name: Henry Kissinger Is Pokemon Going To Die
podcast_details.description: We're a bunch of internet SJWs and this is a leftist politics podcast but instead of being problematic for punching down we're problematic for saying things that could INCORRECTLY be misconstrued as threats against politicians (which we cannot stress enough, it is not, it's just a fact). Memento Pokemori!

Landmine Radio is the podcast for the Alaska Landmine. It is hosted by Landmine Editor-in-Chief Jeff Landfield. The Alaska Landmine delivers Alaska news and gossip that other media outlets don’t report. Landmine Radio focuses on real talk with real Alaskans.

The Heat delves into one big news story every episode and breaks down how these stories impact people like you. We are talking to experts and journalists from around to world with the goal of bringing your perspectives based on first-hand accounts. The Heat is a production of CGTN America and is recorded in Washington,D.C.
Our mission is to bring to life the hope and promise we all felt when we voted for change and for a new day in America.

The Get More Smarter Podcast is a weekly, lighthearted overview of Colorado politics. The podcast is hosted by seasoned Colorado politicos Jason Bane of ColoradoPols.com and Ian Silverii of ProgressNow Colorado. Are you ready to Get More Smarter?
Veteran Chicago Sun-Times City Hall reporter Fran Spielman's interviews with Chicago's movers and shakers.

The Carl DeMaio Show: Ever wonder what REALLY goes on behind the scenes in the halls of Congress? That’s what the Carl DeMaio Show provides listeners with: Carl’s take on the hottest news stories of the day and the story behind the story -- and it's not just information; it's about taking ACTION.
El Enjambre es un podcast de "El Toque" para conversar sobre el universo del Twitter en Cuba, un pretexto para analizar todos los temas que ocurren en la semana

podcast_details.podcast_name: A Podcast of One's Own with Julia Gillard
podcast_details.description:
Former Prime Minister of Australia, Julia Gillard presents a podcast in her role as Chair of the Global Institute for Women's Leadership. In each episode Julia leads a thoughtful but fun discussion with well-known female (and some male) leaders from the worlds of business, entertainment, media, sport and many more. By celebrating their stories and learning the lessons from their lives, the podcast gives us insight into what needs to be done so more women get to lead.


Earnings from the podcast will go back into funding for the Global Institute for Women’s Leadership, furthering the work they do to create a world in which being a woman is no barrier to being a leader.
podcast_details.artist_name: A Podcast of One's Own with Julia Gillard

podcast_details.podcast_name: Lauro e Gabeira (podcast de O Globo)
podcast_details.description: Toda terça-feira, a partir das 17h30, Lauro Jardim e Fernando Gabeira vão estar aqui batendo um papo sobre o assunto da semana. A dupla vai analisar, destrinchar, opinar e dar bastidores de temas que vão da política nacional à política internacional, meio ambiente, sociedade, economia e cultura.

podcast_details.podcast_name: Independent Jeff: Political & Social Justice Perspectives From A Fresh Point Of View
podcast_details.description: Tackling political & social issues from an independent point of view. No partisan spin. No party lines here. Just straight facts & perspectives from ya Independent Homie.  Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/jeffrey-bulls/support
Reporter is a Texas Monthly podcast examining the latest in Texas news and politics.

Radical Reflections stands in resolute and determined solidarity with the working class of all countries, and aims to assist in the campaign to build a strong collective of political activists capable of overthrowing the capitalist mode of production and implementing communism, both nationally and internationally.
A podcast looking at local and state politics -- and the NH presidential primary -- with a focus on the people behind the issues.

podcast_details.podcast_name: The Wolfpack Podcast - Smart Politics With Carl Wolfson, Paul Block, Kim Upham, Dylan Hydes
podcast_details.description: Four activists from Portland, Oregon, led by Portland radio personality, Carl Wolfson, offer key political and cultural insights -- with hearty laughs along the way.  If you want an upbeat message focused on defeating Donald Trump in 2020 and building a better world, this podcast is for you!
podcast_details.artist_name: The Wolfpack Smart Politics: Carl Wolfson, Paul Block, Kim Upham, Dylan Hydes

podcast_details.podcast_name: Going Dark: An Intellectual Dark Web Podcast
podcast_details.description: This podcast is for anyone who is interested in the ideas or individuals related to the Intellectual Dark Web (IDW) such as Jordan Peterson, Joe Rogan, Ben Shapiro, Christina Hoff Sommers, Dave Rubin, Sam Harris and more. The purpose of this podcast is to discuss culture, politics, philosophy, religion and more with an emphasis on freedom of speech and open inquiry. Subscribe to our YouTube channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmMT1a1Xp7_Slmp0C5ppG4g Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/GoingDarkCast

Lo que nadie más te cuenta, toda la actualidad política, económica y cultural con el análisis sin censura de César Vidal.
